title: Donzella desterrada. Or, The banish'd virgin. VVritten originally in Italian: by Cavalier Gio. Francesco Biondi, Gentleman Extraordinary of his Majesties Privy Chamber. Divided into three bookes: and Englished by I.H. of Graies Inne, Gent
author: Biondi, Giovanni Francesco, Sir, 1572-1644.
publisher: By T. Cotes, for Humphrey Mosley, and are to be sold at his shoppe, at the three Kings in Pauls Church yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
